articles.description: Mewgenics is the best-scored game of 2026 on Metacritic, and even if it's early, that seems like it will stick for quite a while.
articles.content: Ahead of its February 10 release, Mewgenics reviews are already in, it being the new game from Edmund McMillen and Tyler Glaiel, where McMillen is behind the beloved Super Meat Boy and The Binding of… [+2595 chars]

articles.title: If You Use Gmail, You're Going To Want To Turn Off This 1 Automatic Setting ASAP - HuffPost
articles.description: Plus: a quick guide to the two-step process for opting out.
articles.content:
Another day, another feature turned on in a load-bearing app that you might want to turn off.
